resources.string: Contrify Share
You must have a valid network connection
Ensure that this device and the remote are connected on the same network. Know more.
You have to open the URL in your remote\'s browser
Select the files you wish to share. (Tap Here)
Only the files which you have selected will be available for upload
Download the files in your remote
You\'re done! Your host\'s browser will download the selected files

WARNING: You are attempting to change the default port. Please ensure that the port is not blocked, reserved or is in use by other application. Non compliance may lead to problems with your network configuration.
A B O U T
Version:

Copyright \u00A9 reserved. No part of this software and all resources associated with the brand \'ServShare\' and \'ContrifyShare\' shall be used without prior permission. Distribution of software is free and all usage including commercial usage of this application is allowed as long as all usage are in purview of the copyright policy.

This software has been tested in multiple testing conditions and various instances have been simulated to study the response and impact. The response and the impact of these studies were deemed to be satisfactory.

NETWORK INTERFERENCE: This software accepts connection on Port 53000 (Default) on the TCP/IP. This is an unreserved port so please ensure that this port isn\'t blocked or in use by other application or server. If it doesn\'t help, consider changing the port in the Settings.
